allOf.description: Defines a general mass measurement (derived from iscMeasurementType).

units.description:
Units specified in UN/CEFACT 3-letter form. Default if not specified is KGM. Mass units for weight from UN/CEFACT trade facilitation recommendation 20.
 Kilogram, Gram, Pound, Metric Tonne, Microgram, Milligram.
